cyclone.name: CRISTOBAL
cyclone.current_location: about 50 miles WSW of Campeche, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to meander in the southern Bay of Campeche through Thursday, then gradually lift northward into the central Gulf of Mexico late in the 5-day period.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Not forecast to make landfall within the next 5 days (remains over Bay of Campeche)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical-storm watch/warning limited to southern Bay of Campeche coast: Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz (Mexico)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Bay of Campeche coast of Mexico
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: VERACRUZ MX (closest listed point in probability table; no Texas points listed)
weather_observation.first_hazard: None expected at Port Arthur, TX within 5-day outlook
weather_observation.wind: None expected through day-5; gale-force probabilities remain near zero for Port Arthur, TX
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected; storm surge threat confined to Bay of Campeche coast of Mexico
weather_observation.rainfall: None expected; heavy-rain footprint limited to southern Mexico and Central America
